name: Space Module
description:
*$2.99 until Monday, August 5th 2019!*

Space Module Alpha - Version v0.1

Try and escape the universe in this space adventure. 

Features

  • Build *your* ship - Create a modular space craft with a number of upgrades.
  • Adapt on the fly - Modify your ship to suit the environment
  • Randomly generated levels - Experience a unique adventure during each play-through.
  • Explore uncharted area - Survive in a world that might not want you around.

For The Future

  • Even more modules! 
  • Updated module designs
  • Cool things

Controls

Move: WASD on the keyboard
Shoot/Use Module: Left Click or Space
Previous Module: Q
Next Module: E
